name: ITgma
tag_list: software-development-company, mobile-application-development, capacity-services, off-shore-services, near-shore-services, on-shore-services, application-engineering, application-development, crm-solutions, sales-automation, direct-marketing, outsourcing-c
overview:
ITgma is technology services and outsourcing company that helps companies rethink their software application strategies and achieve more with less.

• Software services: Capacity services [team extension], Application engineering, and Consulting.

• Software solutions: CRM implementation, Business Sales Automation, Blackberry CRM integration, ITgma SimpleSync (MS Outlook 2way CRM sync).

ITgma’s Clients are Software ISVs, Start-up companies without previous Software Product experience, Companies with Flash web games/applications that need porting to Mobile, enterprises that rely on proprietary software etc.

Successfully working with Clients from United Kingdom, Sweden, Spain, Austria, Baltic region, United States of America, Germany and other countries on their software projects – ITgma helps companies optimize the operational cost while increasing the development capacity.
